src:
Demi Emas, Timnas Hoki Sea Games 2019 Terbang Ke Cekoslawakia
03 Nov 2019, 17:11 by Danang Sundoro



Demi Emas, Timnas Hoki Sea Games 2019 Terbang Ke Cekoslawakia



Demi Emas, Timnas Hoki Sea Games 2019 Terbang Ke Cekoslawakia



Demi Emas, Timnas Hoki Sea Games 2019 Terbang Ke Cekoslawakia


KBRN, Jakarta : Pengurus Pusat Federasi Hoki Indonesia (PP FHI) bertekad mewujudkan mimpi meraih emas diarena SEA Games XXX Filipina, 30 November hingga 11 Desember 2019. 
Ketua PP FHI, Brigjen TNI Yus Adi Kamrullah segera mempersiapkan para atletnya selain latihan secara intensif, juga direncanakan timnas hoki indoor putra putri akan melakukan Traning Center (TC) dan try out ke Cekoslawakia.
Timnas hoki indoor Indonesia yang ditangani pelatih asing asal Iran, Yaghoub Bahrami berencana bertolak Selasa, 5 November 2019.  "Di Cekoslawakia, timnas hoki indoor Indonesia akan menjalani TC sekaligus try out di Turnamen Hoki Internasional. Mereka berada di sana selama 16 hari," ujar Ketua PP FHI, Brigjen TNI Yus Adi Kamrullah dalam keterangan tertulis yang diterima Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI), Minggu (3/11/2019).
"Dua tahun lalu, kita meraih perak dari tim putra dan putri. Di SEA Games Filipina 2019, kita akan berusaha meningkatkannya. Ya, minimal satu medali emas kita targetkan bisa  disumbangkan bagi kontingen Indonesia," tambah Yus Adi Kamrullah di Lapangan Hoki Gelora Bung Karno Jakarta.
Hal senada disampaikan Sekjen PP FHI, Yasser Arafat Suaidy yang menambahkan, timnas Hoki Indonesia sengaja memilih Cekoslawakia sebagai tempat TC dan try out, karena prestasinya cukup bagus. Selain mengikuti turnamen internasional, timnas hoki Indoor Indonesia juga akan menjalani laga uji coba dengan tim hoki Indoor Cekoslawakia. "Kita memilih Cekoslawakia sebagai tempat TC karena prestasi hoki indoor-nya cukup bagus dimana putranya berada di peringkat ketiga dunia dan putrinya di peringkat kelima. Dan, keberadaan Timnas Hoki Indonesia juga mendapat suport dari Federasi Hoki Cekoslawakia dengan memperkenankan menjalani beberapa laga tanding dengan timnas hoki indoor Cekoslawakia. Makanya, kita berharap anak-anak bisa belajar dengan timnas hoki indoor Cekoslawakia sekaligus memetik pengalaman bertanding internsional," jelas Yasser.Berikut Susunan Tim Hoki Indoor Indonesia : # PUTRA : Manajer Tim  : Mayjen TNI RoediantoPelatih Kepala : Yaghoub BahramiAss. Pelatih : Ahriandi Gusmana dan Irwan HermawanAtlet : 1. Ahdan Asasi Ramadhan Uno, 2. Ahmad Fikri Nur Hikmat, 3. Alvin Nourul Saepul Mimbar, 4. Andrea Guntara Adivery Sandrea, 5. Astri Rahmad, 6. Candra Juli Prawesti, 7. Daarul Quthni, 8. Fahmi Hidayatullah, 9. Fajar Jaelani Nugraha, 10. Ferdian Fathur Rahman, 11. Iskandar Zulkarnaen, 12. Muhamad Alfiana, 13. Prima Rinaldi Santoso, 14. Revo Priliandro,15. Tomi Efendi. # PUTRI : Manajer Tim  : Dwi Jati UtomoPelatih Kepala : Yaghoub BahramiAss. Pelatih : Dadan Moh. Ramdani dan Sisworo AriwibowoAtlet : 1. Ai Melis Kusmiati, 2. Annur Amalia El Islamy, 3. Ardita Maulidah,4. Aulia Ghassani  Putri Arindah, 5. Citra Purbasari, 6. Nuraini Sugiarti, 7. Olevia Kbarek, 8. Patmawati, 9. Rahma Dwi Aulia, 10. Selly Amalia Florentina, 11. Sarah Amaniah, 12. Rwede Sabatine Tamar Sawor, 13. Zulita Dwi Aprilia, 14. Putri Krismonita, 15. Rayhan Jannatain Ainani Uno.(Keterangan Foto : Istimewa)
text:
For the sake of Gold, the 2019 Sea Games Hockey Team flew to Czechoslovakia
03 Nov 2019, 17:11 by Danang Sundoro



For the sake of Gold, the 2019 Sea Games Hockey Team flew to Czechoslovakia



For the sake of Gold, the 2019 Sea Games Hockey Team flew to Czechoslovakia



For the sake of Gold, the 2019 Sea Games Hockey Team flew to Czechoslovakia


KBRN, Jakarta: The Central Board of the Indonesian Hockey Federation (PP FHI) is determined to realize the dream of winning gold in the Philippines XXX SEA Games, November 30 to December 11, 2019.
Head of PP FHI, Brigadier General Yus Adi Kamrullah immediately prepared his athletes in addition to intensive training, it was also planned that the men's and women's indoor hockey team would conduct a Traning Center (TC) and try out to Czechoslawakia.
Indonesian indoor hockey national team handled by foreign coach from Iran, Yaghoub Bahrami plans to leave Tuesday, November 5, 2019. "In Czechoslovakia, the Indonesian indoor hockey national team will undergo TC as well as try out at the International Hockey Tournament. They are there for 16 days," said Chairman of PP FHI, Brigadier General Yus Adi Kamrullah in a written statement received by Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI), Sunday (3/11/2019).
"Two years ago, we won silver from the men's and women's team. At the 2019 Philippines SEA Games, we will try to improve it. Yes, at least one gold medal we are targeting can be donated to the Indonesian contingent," Yus Adi Kamrullah added at the Bung Karno Hockey Field. Jakarta.
The same thing was conveyed by the Secretary General of PP FHI, Yasser Arafat Suaidy who added that the Indonesian Hockey national team deliberately chose Czechoslovakia as a TC place and try out, because its performance was quite good. Aside from participating in international tournaments, the Indoor Indonesia hockey national team will also undergo a trial match with the Czechoslovakia Indoor hockey team. "We chose Czechoslovakia as a TC place because the indoor hockey achievement was quite good where the son was ranked third in the world and his daughter ranked fifth. And, the existence of the Indonesian Hockey National Team also received support from the Czechoslovakian Hockey Federation by allowing them to undergo several match matches with the hockey national team. indoor Czechoslovakia. Therefore, we hope that children can learn with the Czechoslovak indoor hockey national team while at the same time reaping international competition experience, "explained Yasser. Following the composition of the Indonesian Indoor Hockey Team: # SONS: Team Manager: Maj. Gen. Roedianto Head Coach: Yaghoub BahramiAss. Coaches: Ahriandi Gusmana and Irwan Hermawan Athlet: 1. Ahdan Asasi Ramadhan Uno, 2. Ahmad Fikri Nur Hikmat, 3. Alvin Nourul Saepul Mimbar, 4. Andrea Guntara Adivery Sandrea, 5. Astri Rahmad, 6. Candra Juli Prawesti, 7. Daarul Quthni, 8. Fahmi Hidayatullah, 9. Fajar Jaelani Nugraha, 10. Ferdian Fathur Rahman, 11. Iskandar Zulkarnaen, 12. Muhamad Alfiana, 13. Prima Rinaldi Santoso, 14. Revo Priliandro, 15. Tomi Efendi. # PRINCESS: Team Manager: Dwi Jati Utomo Head Coach: Yaghoub BahramiAss. Coach: Dadan Moh. Ramdani and Sisworo Ariwibowo Athletes: 1. Ai Melis Kusmiati, 2. Annur Amalia El Islamy, 3. Ardita Maulidah, 4. Aulia Ghassani Putri Arindah, 5. Citra Purbasari, 6. Nuraini Sugiarti, 7. Olevia Kbarek, 8. Patmawati, 9. Rahma Dwi Aulia, 10. Selly Amalia Florentina, 11. Sarah Amaniah, 12. Rwede Sabatine Tamar Sawor, 13. Zulita Dwi Aprilia, 14. Putri Krismonita, 15. Rayhan Jannatain Ainani Uno (Photo Caption: Special)
